entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json: custom "Ignore" conditions on properties #102945
  • [Mono] Add support for UnsafeAccessor mismatched generic constraint checking #102942
    Future
  • [.NET 8] Some Symbol Entries in perf-%pid.map Are Truncated #102938
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] RegionInfo instantiated by two-letter code is missing information #102937
  • `JsonObject` should support property order manipulation #102932
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc monitoring can't access Activity Events or Links #102924
    Future
  • Source generator tests failing with AV in Roslyn #102919
  • ISet in .NET 8 not populating from configuration as expected in .NET 6 #102926
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: DateOnly support for Calendar #102910
    Future
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string> on EqualityComparer<string>.Default #102906
    9.0.0

Closed

  • MeterListener continues to receive measurements after Dispose #102465
    Future
  • System.IO.Packaging.Open throws FileFormatException saying File contains corrupted data when the size of the package is more than 4GB and targeting .NET Framework #94899
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource: Out of proc monitoring can't influence IsEnabled #102935
    Future
  • CodeGen difference when manually extracting element to a local #102518
    9.0.0
  • JIT generates better code when expression is stored in variable #102273
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Constant is not propagated through a struct #87072
    9.0.0
  • BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd Timed Out #97735
    Future
  • SPMI Replay failing sporadically #102773
  • [System.Text.Json] Expose additional metadata in contract APIs. #102078
    9.0.0
  • Expose ElementType and KeyType on JsonTypeInfo metadata. #77306
    9.0.0
  • Build is broken for main due to conflicting PRs #102930
  • UnsafeAccessor throws MissingFieldException on enum fields #102792
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.4.24253.11] IPInterfaceProperties.GatewayAddresses. FirstOrDefault() returns Null #101710
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support parsing server-sent events (SSE) #98105
    9.0.0
  • Valgrind on Alpine Linux: Mismatched free() / delete / delete [] #70636
    9.0.0
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization correct HashCode ranges of skipped unicodes #101912
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Perf runs are broken #93880
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] ` Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample`, `Wasm.Browser.Config.Sample` fail #91676
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Optimize reading from Quic stream #58445
    Future
  • JIT Optimization (Stack Usage?) #13814
    Future
  • Fix incorrect `GTF_IND_NONFAULTING` setting that leads to an incorrect execution. #13762
    Future
  • Unsafe cast confuses JIT Inline Optimizer #47082
    Future
  • vs2022 17.5.0 preview2.0 failed to load the old project #79984

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete VectorT size constants from minipal/cpufeatures #102946
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Baseline failing pri-1 JIT tests #102944
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview5] [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102943
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • [test] Update the reason why Verify_Generic_ConstraintEnforcement is not running on Mono #102939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [vm] fix confusing use of m_pCanonMT (NFC) #102936
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102934
    needs-area-label
  • Fix bug in referencing nested type in IL #102933
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch #102929
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update Android and Linux-Bionic images #102928
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dotnet-diag to area-diagnostics-coreclr #102925
    area-Meta
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add gcinfodumper implementation. #102920
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Optimize HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode by using SearchValues #102917
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Baseline failing pri-1 interop tests #102916
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Experiment - Remove space restriction from XarchIntrinsicConstants #102913
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement IAlternateEqualityComparer support for Dictionary, HashSet, ConcurrentDictionary #102907
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Adding Activity.AddException #102905
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Tweak the fuzzing readme #102947
    needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • MeterListener.Dispose always disables measurements #102661
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #102053
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Consume FMA intrinsic operands in right order #102914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate `LCL_ADDR` nodes during local morph #102808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove reserved registers from parameter homing temp reg candidates #102168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable binder tracing test under jitstress #102842
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Update docs.microsoft.com usages to learn.microsoft.com #102881
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102640
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.31
  • [release/8.0] Update DIA to 17.10.0-beta1.24272.1 #102641
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • Baseline failing loader tests #102918
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Expose additional metadata on the STJ contract model. #102902
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few allocations in JsonContent #102859
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Update new ActivatorCache usage to the new API model. #102931
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Fix `UnsafeAccessor`s with enum fields #102853
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • fix NetworkInterface properties on Windows #102900
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added SVE LoadVector*NonFaultingZeroExtendTo* APIs #102860
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents #102238
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • `Activator.CreateInstance` supports ByRefLike types #102636
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Restrict the maximum length of BigInteger #102874
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update UnwindRegistersRestore.S #102901
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix computing new EH ranges in SubstitutedILProvider #102870
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement LoadVector*NonFaultingSignExtendTo* APIs #102903
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #102912
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr

Updated

  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Allow shuffle and other hwintrinsic that require a constant to stay intrinsic if the operand becomes constant later #102827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make `MemoryMarshal.CreateSpan` an intrinsic on mono and use `MemoryMarshal.CreateSpan` instead of `Span` pointer constructor in Number.NumberBuffer.cs #102866
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2464547 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Activate some H/3 tests, consistent ConfigureAwait, RemoteExecutor.DisposeAsync #102699
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Propagate profile flags to loop preheaders in `Compiler::optCloneLoops` #102897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92901 #102862
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: GetActiveElementCount #102813
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update prerequisites to add azure.identity #102274
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize HttpUtility.UrlEncodeToBytes for (string, Encoding) overload. #102805
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove debug symbols from non-symbols ilc package #102803
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use `where T : allows ref struct` in runtime #102795
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Add fast path for linq count with predicate #102884
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove noisy test #102610
    area-System.Net
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
